batchEditing.setAllMarchersToNextPage: Set all marcher coordinates to next page
batchEditing.setAllMarchersToPreviousPage: Set all marcher coordinates to previous page
batchEditing.setSelectedMarchersToNextPage: Set selected marcher(s) coordinates to next page
batchEditing.setSelectedMarchersToPreviousPage: Set selected marcher(s) coordinates to previous page

cursorMode.alignmentEventLine: Create a line out of the selected marchers
cursorMode.applyQuickShape: Snaps marchers to shape without creating an editable object
cursorMode.createMarcherShape: Creates a new shape with lines or curves that can be edited across pages

electronInteractions.launchImportMusicXmlFileDialogue: Import MusicXML file to get measures
electronInteractions.launchInsertAudioFileDialogue: Load new audio file into the show

individualPDFs.description: If this is not checked, one large PDF file will be created with every coordinate sheet in score order.
individualPDFs.label: Create PDF files for each individual marcher organized in folders by section

preview.label: Preview
preview.subtext: 4 -> 1/4 = nearest quarter step | 10 -> 1/10 = nearest tenth step

toast.noFieldProperties: Field properties are required for export

checkpoint.deleteTooltip: Delete this checkpoint from the field
checkpoint.fieldLabelTooltip: The label to appear on the field (i.e. yard markers)
checkpoint.nameTooltip: The primary name of the checkpoint.
checkpoint.referenceTooltip: If this checkpoint should be used as a reference for coordinates.
checkpoint.shortNameTooltip: The short name of the checkpoint.
checkpoint.stepsTooltip: The number of steps away from the front of the field that this checkpoint is.
checkpoint.stepsTooltip2: A negative number is pointed towards the back
checkpoint.visibleTooltip: If this checkpoint should be visible on the field

fieldPropertiesSelector.differentSizeWarning: Marchers will not move to the new field type size, they will stay where they are on the canvas. You can always change back the field type.
fieldPropertiesSelector.noFieldProperties: FieldProperties not defined. This should never happen

fieldPropertiesSettings.noFieldProperties: No field properties to load! This should never happen, please reach out to support!

launch.bugNote: You also agree to the collection of anonymous error logs and crash reports.
launch.subtitle: The open-source drill writing app
launch.warning: OpenMarch is still in development. By using it, you accept that there may be potential glitches and bugs.
